subject: Blogs and Blogging (Internet)
Basketball
Computers and the Internet
lead_paragraph: The Sporting News signed Nathaniel Friedman, a k a Bethlehem Shoals, of the blog FreeDarko, to spearhead a new N.B.A.-only blog called the Baseline.
snippet: The Sporting News signed Nathaniel Friedman, a k a Bethlehem Shoals, of the blog FreeDarko, to spearhead a new N.B.A.-only blog called the Baseline.
